response.responseTooltip: Introduce yourself to the centaur.

Ask Kheiron about his history and how he came to own this tavern.
Ask Kheiron if he has four large, spare barrels which could be sent to Oglix's tavern.

Just as Oglix said, Kheiron is refusing to cooperate, but perhaps the phrase Golix gave you to use will work...
Now that Kheiron has promised to send four barrels to Oglix, you wonder what to do next...
Exit the tavern and head back out into the streets of Elis.

#IF(pc.isAbleToAccessCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH, true)) Approach the table where Fae and Silvia are sitting and say hello. #ELSE You need to be able to access your mouth in order to have fun with Fae and Silvia... #ENDIF

#IF(!flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_tavern_fae_small_talk)) Spend some time talking with the foxtauresses. #ELSE The foxtauresses don't seem interested in spending any more time talking with you tonight. #ENDIF
